- External alteration to basement flat comprising vertical enlargement on elevation facing Stanhope Mews South and replacement with slimline timber sash single glazed windows, vertical enlargement of WC window opening facing the lightwell and replacement with slimline timber sash single glazing window, replacement of modern existing sliding aluminium door facing the lightwell (ref number PP/22/05977 - awaiting decision)

- Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) new rooflight, including section, at scale of 1:20; b) proposed reflected ceiling plan; c) secondary glazing, including detail of framing at positioning and means of fixing; d) any new internal doors, including a section, at 1:10; e) sample of new hard flooring) of Listed Building consent LB/22/04183 (Internal alterations comprising preparatory and strip out works; electrical rewiring; plumbing and drainage works; extensive damp proofing and replastering; carpentry; roofing works including lantern light replacement; kitchen and bathroom fitting; painting and decorating; flooring installation; and marble installation works) (ref number CON/22/06502)
description: Replacement brick arch with a steel frame; replacement of no.2 brick piers in the kitchen/living area, removal of  gallows brackets in bedroom; reinstatement of chimney breast; removal of suspended ceiling in hallway
